Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at NH Sevilla Viapol in Seville (Sur), you'll be minutes from Regional Military Museum and Plaza de Espana. This 4-star hotel is close to Alcazar and Seville Cathedral.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 96 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature hair dryers and bathrobes. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and separate sitting areas.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at a coffee shop/café serving guests of NH Sevilla Viapol. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Seville? This hotel has facilities measuring 5942 square feet (552 square meters), including conference space. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at a coffee shop/café serving guests of NH Sevilla Viapol. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Regional Military Museum - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Plaza de Espana - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Nervion Mall - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan Stadium - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi

Royal Pavilion - 1 km / 0.6 mi

Murillo House - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi

The preferred airport for NH Sevilla Viapol is Seville (SVQ-San Pablo) - 8.5 km / 5.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
